rdf:Description.dc:title: Remote sensing for brush encroachment : landsat monitoring of brush encroachment in fescue grasslands of southwest Alberta 1984 landsat monitoring of brush encroachment in fescue grasslands of southwest Alberta /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Thompson, M. D.
Intera Environmental Consultants.
Alberta Remote Sensing Center.
rdf:Description.dc:description: One transparency in pocket at back of book.
This is the abridged edition of a remote sensing demonstration project report. Complete report available for in-Center study.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Rangelands
Shrublands
Range management
Remote sensing
